area.name: Fortress Entry Hall
area.description: The Entrance to an imposing fortress. This is where your adventure to find the lost Tome of Akanog begins. It is also rumored that treasure lies deep in the fortress.

area.name: Long Hallway
area.description: A long hallway leading to a large wooden door. There are red banners with a black dragon one the walls. Something seems to be guarding the road ahead.

area.name: Small Room
area.description: A really small dark room. When you upen the door, something on the floor seems to have twinkled.

area.name: Dining Hall
area.description: A large dining hall. Someone seems to be prepairing the tables for a feast.

area.name: Kitchen
area.description: A small kitchen. A arge wooden table is in the middle of the room. Someone seems to preparing a treat

area.name: Throne Room
area.description: The main room of the fortress. A beautiful chandellier hangs above a marble throne adorned with thousands of rubies. There is a particular large gem at the top of the throne on which someone sits, looking at you curiously.

area.name: Library
area.description: A rather large library full of books. In the middle in a display case there is a large book.
